title: The tiny and powerful M4 Mac mini drops to its new best price
content:
Macworld

If you don’t need the power of the new Mac Studio, there’s a brand new best price for the new M4 Mac Mini. Amazon is selling the super-small computer with 512GB of storage for $699, a savings of $100, and the best price we’ve ever seen for this configuration.

This tiny Mac will fit in nicely on your desktop, giving you the chance to have the clutter-free office you’ve always wanted. It’s not just the size that sells this computer, of course, but also its awesome features. With a snappy M4 chip, the Mac mini can handle absolutely anything you throw its way. The 16GB memory will definitely help you handle anything you throw at it, and the upgraded 512GB of storage space will be more than enough space for movies, music, photos, and projects.

We reviewed the new Mac mini with the M4 Pro and found it tiny and quiet with great performance and a good selection of ports from Thunderbolt port to HDMI, Gigabit Ethernet, and plenty of type-C ports. So, don’t miss out on the chance to get yourself the new M4 Mac Mini for $699 at Amazon, its best price ever.
